The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three starring the same character played by Dudikoff. Well, it is an enjoyable one and if you like lots of action and a story with few twists it is probably one for you.
